page.title: 20MY LEISURE TIME.
page.content: My name is Clifford Bruce and this is how I spend my Sundays.I get up at about 10.00a.m.and put my jeans and army jumper on,then I have my breakfast.I then put my motor bike boots on and collect my helmet and walk to Moorcourt Farm to get my bike and meet Kevin Smith who collects his scramble bike.We go up to the pit and ride up big hills and fall off.We then meet Chris Collins and ride across to Nomansland,we then return and put the bikes away. My bike is made up from a scramble and a road bike.Road bikes are used on the road and scramble bikes are ridden across dirt tracks.
